PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-09282011-09-22,  ,  ,  AANDC, 
ActIndian Act
SubjectQalipu Mi’kmaq First Nation Band Order
PrecisQALIPU MI'KMAQ FIRST NATION BAND ORDER. to declare that the Founding Members of the Band constitute the Qalipu Mi’kmaq First Nation as a Band within the meaning of the Indian Act, and as such, the Founding Members are entitled to registration. This allows the Founding Members to access existing federal programs available to registered Indians and satisfies the conditions of the Agreement.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0180 Publication Date: 2011-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment

This allows the Founding Members to access existing federal programs available to registered Indians and satisfies the conditions of the Agreement.
